claw.tatsu.primitive

Class Loop

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.primitive.Loop

  • public final class Loop
extends java.lang.Object
    Primitive transformation and test applied on FdoStatement. This included: - loop fusion (merge) - loop reorder (reorder) - loop hoisting (hoist) - extract body of a loop - check iteration range
    Author:
    clementval

    • Method Detail

      • merge

        public static void merge(Xnode masterDoStmt,
                         Xnode slaveDoStmt)
                  throws IllegalTransformationException
        Merge two do statements together. Body of the slave do statement will be append to the body of the master do statement.
        Parameters:
        masterDoStmt - Master do statement for the merge operation. Stay in place. Other do statement will be merged into it.
        slaveDoStmt - Slave do statement for the merge operation. Will be merged into the master do statement.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If given node are null or not FdoStatement nodes.

      • merge

        public static void merge(NestedDoStatement master,
                         NestedDoStatement slave)
                  throws IllegalTransformationException
        Merge two nested do statements group together. Inner most body of the slave group is merged into the inner most body of the master group. Slave group is then deleted.
        Parameters:
        master - Master nested do statements group for the merge operation.
        slave - Slave nested do statements group for the merge operation.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If given node are null or not FdoStatement nodes.

      • reorder

        public static void reorder(NestedDoStatement nestedGroup,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> newInductionVarOrder)
                    throws IllegalTransformationException
        Perform a do statements reordering based on the new order specified by induction variables.

        i,j,k → k,j,i

        Parameters:
        nestedGroup - The nested group of do statements to be reordered.
        newInductionVarOrder - New order of the induction variables. E.g. k,j,i.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If reordering acton is not supported.

      • hoist

        public static HoistedNestedDoStatement hoist(java.util.List<HoistedNestedDoStatement> hoistedGroups,
                                             Xnode start,
                                             Xnode end,
                                             XcodeML xcodeml)
                                      throws IllegalTransformationException
        Perform a loop hoisting on the given nested do statements.
        Parameters:
        hoistedGroups - List of groups that will be hoisted.
        start - Starting point of the hoisted loop.
        end - Ending point of the hoisted loop.
        xcodeml - Current XcodeML translation unit for node creation.
        Returns:
        Hoisted nested do statement group.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If underlying methods throw exception.

      • extractBody

        public static void extractBody(Xnode loop,
                               Xnode ref)
                        throws IllegalTransformationException
        Extract the body of a do statement and place it after the reference node.
        Parameters:
        loop - The do statement containing the body to be extracted.
        ref - Element after which statement are shifted.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If node passed as arguments are incompatible with the transformation.

      • extractBody

        public static void extractBody(Xnode loop)
                        throws IllegalTransformationException
        Extract the body of a do statement and place it directly after it.
        Parameters:
        loop - The do statement containing the body to be extracted.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If node passed as arguments are incompatible with the transformation.

      • extractBody

        public static void extractBody(NestedDoStatement nest)
                        throws IllegalTransformationException
        Extract the body of the inner do statement and place it directly after the outer do statement.
        Parameters:
        nest - Nest do statement group.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If node passed as arguments are incompatible with the transformation.

      • extractInductionVariable

        public static java.lang.String extractInductionVariable(Xnode doStatement)
        Get the string representation of the induction variable of a do statement.
        Parameters:
        doStatement - Do statement to extract the induction variable.
        Returns:
        The string value of the induction variable. Empty string if the passed Xnode is not a FdoStatement node or has no Var node.

      • hasSameIndexRange

        public static boolean hasSameIndexRange(Xnode l1,
                                        Xnode l2)
        Compare the iteration range of two do statements.
        Parameters:
        l1 - First do statement.
        l2 - Second do statement.
        Returns:
        True if the iteration range are identical.

      • hasSameIndexRangeBesidesLower

        public static boolean hasSameIndexRangeBesidesLower(Xnode l1,
                                                    Xnode l2)
        Compare the iteration range of two do statements.
        Parameters:
        l1 - First do statement.
        l2 - Second do statement.
        Returns:
        True if the iteration range are identical besides the lower bound.
